name: Liquid Porcelain™
description: Liquid Porcelain™ was created specifically for the tub and tile refinishing industry. Liquid Porcelain provides a water and stain resistant finish that lasts for years and can withstand the rigorous service exposure that bath and kitchen surfaces are subjected to. Liquid Porcelain has the highest gloss, gloss retention, color retention, and durability available in today's paint technology. This two-part acrylic urethane dries quickly and has a resilient, tile-like toughness that provides unrivaled impact and abrasion resistance. Furthermore, Liquid Porcelain is water impermeable and completely resistant to most chemical splash and spill contact. This premium refinishing enamel comes in three gloss levels: high gloss, semi-gloss, and low semi-gloss.
